StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetColumnData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TableName sysname, @IsTempTable char(1) = 'N' AS
DECLARE @TableID int
SELECT @TableID = CASE @IsTempTable WHEN 'Y' THEN OBJECT_ID('tempdb..' + @TableName) ELSE OBJECT_ID(@TableName) END
IF @IsTempTable = 'N' BEGIN SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(40), COLUMN_NAME) AS COLUMN_NAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH) AS CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, UPPER(IS_NULLABLE) AS IS_NULLABLE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), COLUMN_DEFAULT) AS COLUMN_DEFAULT, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sysobjects WHERE name = @TableName AND replinfo != 0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PUBLISHED_FOR_REPLICATION, ORDINAL_POSITION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = @TableName ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME END ELSE BEGIN SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(40), COLUMN_NAME) AS COLUMN_NAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH) AS CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, UPPER(IS_NULLABLE) AS IS_NULLABLE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), COLUMN_DEFAULT) AS COLUMN_DEFAULT, CASE --- WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE name LIKE @TableName + '%' AND replinfo != 0) THEN 'Y' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tempdb..sysobjects WHERE id = @TableID AND replinfo != 0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PUBLISHED_FOR_REPLICATION, ORDINAL_POSITION FROM tempdb.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME LIKE @TableName + '%' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME END
